imdb.title: Jigoku shôjo
imdb.plot: When someone wants revenge, they post about it on a special website at midnight. Then Hell Girl appears to do their bidding.

episodes.title: Cracked Mask
episodes.plot: The one to be avenged: Haruka Yasuda The one to be damned: Namiko Todaka A mother driven to suicide by relentless persecution, the accidental witness of an afternoon tryst. Her young daughter a silent associate to the suffering. When Haruka seeks out HellCorrespondence.com for understanding, revenge is offered forth instead. And while some things are better left unseen, others should definitely be left so. For with knowledge comes hatred, and with hatred damnation. As a single person looks to unravel a family, the youngest will strike back... Through parted curtains, ...

episodes.title: Yûgata no kanata yori
episodes.plot: A girl who is bullied and forced to do things that end up getting her in trouble, hears of a website that allows you to send someone to Hell.

episodes.title: Miirareta shôjo
episodes.plot: Already more than year an unknown maniac sends disgusting gifts and constantly keeps ringing to the schoolgirl Reko. A police is powerless, and girl on verge of nervous derangement.

episodes.title: Yogoreta maundo
episodes.plot: A stuck-up jock beats another boy with a bat which leads to his death. He places the blame on an innocent boy who may choose to send him to hell.

episodes.title: Kikoenu sakebi goe
episodes.plot: Main doctor of one of veterinary clinics interest money only. He with pleasure watches death of dog on an operating table, assuring a hostess, that he did all possible. But when the hostess of dog hears a frightful true about a doctor, she decides to punish him.

episodes.title: Takai tô no shôjo
episodes.plot: Girl working as in a large company a specialist on computers constantly tries to put right connection with Ai Enma. But all queries are ignored. But however Ai Enma and her helpers decided to watch after a girl. Unexpectedly a girl knows that her boss relates to death of father. And now, maybe, her query of Enma will be considered.

episodes.title: Hiru sagari no mado
episodes.plot: Woman to become a casual witness that, how her rich and influential neighbor changes to the husband. After it a neighbor and her lover begin to threaten her.

episodes.title: Hibi wareta kamen
episodes.plot: To the proprietress of school of actor mastery, known and respected actress, own daughter wants to take revenge. She considers that a mother specially does not notice her talent and in anything does not put.

episodes.title: Seijaku no majiwari
episodes.plot: Chiaki Tanuma is sure that her friend is in a coma from her fellow. Chiaki decides to take revenge.

episodes.title: Amai wana
episodes.plot: Head-cook of the known cafe the recipe of pastry reaches deception for the sisters Yuki and Hiromi and gives out for it, in passing accusing them of theft. Reputation of sisters and their shop falls sharply after it. Yuki decides to take revenge.

episodes.title: Tomodachi
episodes.plot: Schoolgirl wishes to take revenge Minami to the best friend Siori, because that left off with her to intermingle. But a friend finds a straw doll understands that at by Minami on a mind. .

episodes.title: Chigireta ito
episodes.plot: A young fellow wants to take revenge to the scandalous journalist that slandered his father. He gathers to send a scoundrel in hell, and Sibata tries to prevent a transaction.

episodes.title: Koboreta kakera tachi
episodes.plot: Shy and bashful Savai already more than week misses school. Young teacher Fukasava every day comes to her home and tries to find out reason of her trances. Savai decides to call on a web-site "Hellish correspondence".

episodes.title: Rengoku shôjo
episodes.plot: During next vision of Tsugumi, Sibata hears about one shop for adults. Getting in a shop, he finds a magazine with the article "Girl from purgatory", written 50 more than back. In the article told about a man, mailing a letter to Hellish Girl. The former proprietor of magazine said Sibata, that the article was written by one of his reporters by name Fukumoto. As that living still, Sibata decides to search him.

episodes.title: Fukurokôji no mukô
episodes.plot: A girl wishes to take revenge to the mayor of city, as considers that he killed her father. Sibata knows tries to prevent to her to accomplish revenge.

episodes.title: Shima no onna
episodes.plot: Sibata with daughter arrive on an island Sarutsuki, where meet girl Mina. She wants to take revenge to the aunt.

episodes.title: Tabi geinin no yoru
episodes.plot: In next vision, Tsugumi sees the playbill of circus. Sibata takes daughter and they set forth for an arriving to them in a city circus. There coming him to know, who and for what decided to take advantage of services of Hellish Girl.

episodes.title: Garasu no fûkei
episodes.plot: Sibata and Tsugumi arrive in a resort hotel that is almost empty. From a personnel they meet a doctor and train nurse only, and from patients - little girl with light hair by name Nina. To midday a resort hotel surrounds dense fog, and Sibata forces to remain in a house for the night.

episodes.title: Shibarareta shôjo
episodes.plot: A cruel and lonely old woman forces a girl named Miki to prepare food for her. The woman took away Miki's two dogs as hostages and threatens to kill them if she doesn't cook food. The girl decides to take revenge on the woman and summons Hell Girl.

episodes.title: Hanayoume ningyô
episodes.plot: Mother-in-law compels daughter-in-law to get dressed and look, as a doll. But Inori quite not wants to look like an inanimate object. She tries to tell everything to the husband, but not finding support and for him, applies on a web-site "Hellish correspondence".

episodes.title: Jigoku shôjo tai jigoku shônen
episodes.plot: Once a long ago parents killed the son, frightened his capabilities. But, after a few years, a boy succeeded to return from hell and kill the parents. Now he carries the name "Jill from hell", he is a famous conjurer, and he has an aim - to enter the lists to famous Girl from Hell.

episodes.title: Yasashii rinjin
episodes.plot: Good intentions of neighbour Sekinreski - it a method to harm Murai and his daughter Yuki actually. And it succeeds him. Falling in depression, Murai perishes. Yuki decides to take revenge to the neighbour. However Yuki is the best friend Tsugumi, and that knows already, that a contract with Hellish Girl almost entered into.

episodes.title: Kaikon no ame
episodes.plot: The rejected fellow wants to take revenge to the former girl that gave up him for the sake of other. This situation compels Sibatu to remember about the wife and about the events of long-term remoteness.

episodes.title: Byôtô no hikari
episodes.plot: Nice and friendly train nurse Sakuragi must the next victim of girl become from hell. But really was so benevolent and decent girl able to whom that to do a lot of harm, and so, that it wanted to send her straight in hell?

episodes.title: Yûgure no sato
episodes.plot: Tsugumi with Sibata depart from a city in mountains, where find "Temple of seven children". The abbot of monastery tells that 400 more than back here sacrificed little girls. Due to this history, Ai Enma remembers the past and wishes to take revenge.

episodes.title: Jigoku shôjo
episodes.plot: Japan. 400 back. Ai Enma and Tsentaro were the best friends, while the moment of the real verification of their friendship did not come. Deciding to go against the laws of village, Tsentaro canceled the fates of many people on a few centuries forward. Including the fates of Tsugumi and Sibata.

episodes.title: Karinui
episodes.plot: A desire to take revenge fully captured Ai Enma. Deciding to provoke Tsugumi, she tells to her that Sibata is guilty in death of her mother, and suggests to make a bargain with her.
